home.title: Full Stack Developer
home.aboutMe: Business IT professional specializing in web development, with an emphasis on backend, API consumption and design, as well as database modeling, design, and administration. I am an organized, responsible, and results-oriented individual with the ability to work in a team, adapt quickly to new environments, and solve problems efficiently, even under pressure.
home.welcomeMessage:
Graduate in Business Informatics with a solid background in software development and hands-on experience gained both in academic and professional environments. During my university studies, I developed several projects focused on web systems, management applications, API consumption, and database management, which allowed me to strengthen my technical knowledge and analytical skills.
I had the opportunity to work at the company Dynamic Advance, where I actively participated in the development of web applications, mainly working in the Backend area through the design and consumption of REST APIs, business logic management, and database administration. Additionally, I collaborated on Frontend development using technologies such as React and Next.js, which gave me a comprehensive full-stack development perspective. I consider myself a responsible, organized, and adaptable person, with strong teamwork skills, problem-solving abilities, and sound decision-making in demanding environments.

contact.subtitle: Do you have a project in mind or just want to say hi? Feel free to reach out.
